name: Khuz's Adventure
description:
This game was canceled by the studio and the game was never finished. So what I’m demoing is the game in the state it was in when I stopped working on it. It contains quite a few bugs and graphical issues.

Also, this was originally built to be a mobile game so you will see prompts that would make sense if you were playing on a mobile device. Unfortunately the latest build I have access to is a PC build so that's what I'm demoing.

Controls : 

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • E to charge
